Client Meeting - AcmeCorp Website Redesign

Date: March 10, 2024
Participants: Jennifer Adams (AcmeCorp CEO), Robert Kim (Design Lead), Emma Davis (Project Manager)

Agenda:
- Present initial design concepts
- Discuss timeline and budget
- Address client feedback

Key Points:
- Jennifer loved the modern design direction
- Requested adding a blog section to the homepage
- Wants to see mobile designs by next week
- Budget approved for additional features

Feedback:
- Color scheme: Jennifer prefers blue over green
- Navigation: Keep it simple, max 5 menu items
- About page needs more emphasis on company values

Action Items:
- Robert to revise designs with blue color scheme by March 17 (urgent)
- Emma will update project timeline and send to Jennifer by tomorrow
- Robert needs to create mobile mockups by March 20
- Emma to schedule follow-up meeting for March 24

Decisions:
- Go ahead with Phase 1 development
- Launch target: End of April
- Monthly check-ins starting next month

Next Steps:
- Present revised designs
- Begin development after approval
- Set up staging environment
